title: No Chat Systems Are Working
body: No chat systems are working in league including champ select, clubs, friends list and general chat in the client. Please do something about it is making it very hard to do anything in league of legends.

replies.body:
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/yoms4sUE-friends-in-the-friends-list-are-gone?comment=0002

> [{quoted}](name=Bark Wahlberg,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=yoms4sUE,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-03-26T09:26:06.473+0000)
>
> Hey all, we found and fixed some problems. Anyone able to confirm this is resolved for them now?

Is the issue resolved now?
